name: Unseat
summary: You attempt to knock an opponent off their mount.
description:
You attempt to knock an opponent off their mount. Make a melee Strike against a mounted opponent. If your attack hits, attempt an Athletics check against the opponent's Fortitude DC. If you succeed, the foe is knocked off its mount into a space of its choice adjacent to its mount. If you critically succeed, it lands prone.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
